name: Walk-O-Motion - SONIC VR Prototype
description:
Sonic in VR, with the best locomotion![prototype 2]



Welcome to the Green Hill VR Demo with Walk-O-Motion
The VR locomotion system uses head tracking to allow you to physically 'run' through the game.
BE THE HEDGEHOG!



This game is a full rebuild of the first level of the original Sonic The Hedgehog for Megadrive.

The movement system allows you to physically walk, jog, run and jump within the game, I first released a Mario Bros game with it, now I've adapted it for Sonic!

  • The original Green Hill Zone Act 1, built from scratch for VR.
  • The ability to physically run as sonic.
  • No harnesses. No restrictions. No giant omni-directional Treadmill!
  • You can Jump, you can Spin, you can collect Golden Rings... It's perfect :P
  • The best version of Nostalgia.

Game now running both SteamVR and Oculus!

Use DOWN on the Right Hand Touchpad to jump in Vive Mode



I'm constantly looking for ways to better this system so I will try to expand and implement any suggestions from the comments!

Try it and see how it feels!


Like what you've seen? Be sure to check out my stuff on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/user/nimsony
